3.title: Github Explorer
3.description: A Github Explorer web app to search and explore github user profiles using data fetched from Github REST API. The page uses infinite scroll to display the list of repositories efficiently.

4.title: Tambola
4.description: Play the popular board game Tambola (Indian Bingo) with this fun and responsive random number generator with special messages for each number.

6.title: Kollab Space
6.description: A collab app for students,teachers and colleagues to interact, share and collaborate ideas in a simplified manner and work together with increased productivity in a sophisticated environment

7.title: Hulu Clone
7.description: A fully functional, responsive and user friendly Hulu clone where users can browse and search their favourite movies and shows, sort them into lists and much more....

8.title: LinkedIn Clone
8.description: A fully web resposive LinkedIn Clone which allows to create and read posts, comment and improve their social experience with realtime updates with a minimal and attractive UI.
